com.github.dandelion.core.web.handler.debug

Interface DebugPage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDebugPage, AlertReportingDebugPage, AssetsDebugPage, AssetStorageDebugPage, BundleStorageDebugPage, CacheDebugPage, OptionsDebugPage

    public interface DebugPage

    Contract for all debug pages.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContext() 
      Map<String,String> getExtraParams() 
      String getId()
      Returns the identifier of the debug page, used in its URI.
      String getName() 
      String getTemplate(HandlerContext context)
      Loads the template of the debug page and returns it as a String in order to be processed.
      void initWith(HandlerContext context)
      Initializes the debug page with the current context.

    • Method Detail

      • initWith

        void initWith(HandlerContext context)

        Initializes the debug page with the current context.

        Parameters:
        context - The wrapper object holding the context.

      • getId

        String getId()

        Returns the identifier of the debug page, used in its URI.

        For example "assets" in http://domain/context/?ddl-debug&ddl-debug-page=assets.

        Returns:
        the idenfier of the debug page, used its URI.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the debug page, used in the sidebar menu.

      • getTemplate

        String getTemplate(HandlerContext context)
                   throws IOException

        Loads the template of the debug page and returns it as a String in order to be processed.

        Parameters:
        context - The wrapper object holding the context.
        Returns:
        the template as a String
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong while loading the template.

      • getExtraParams

        Map<String,String> getExtraParams()

      • getContext

        String getContext()
